data.chText: 诚实的；老实的；正直的
data.enText: always telling the truth, and never stealing or cheating

data.chText: 诚实的男人 / 女人
data.enText: an honest man/woman

data.chText: 坦率的；坦诚的
data.enText: not hiding the truth about sth

data.chText: 坦率的回答
data.enText: an honest answer

data.chText: 你丝毫没有隐瞒你的感情吗？
data.enText: Are you being completely honest about your feelings?

data.chText: 感谢你对我这么坦诚。
data.enText: Thank you for being so honest with me.

data.chText: 告诉我你的真实意见。
data.enText: Give me your honest opinion.

data.chText: 说实在的，那是我读过的最差的书之一。
data.enText: To be honest (= what I really think is) , it was one of the worst books I've ever read.

data.chText: 坦率地说吧，她对迈克有好感只不过是因为他有钱。
data.enText: Let's be honest , she's only interested in Mike because of his money.

data.chText: 真诚的；显示内心诚意的；表示态度诚恳的
data.enText: showing an honest mind or attitude

data.chText: 她有一张真诚的面孔。
data.enText: She's got an honest face.

data.chText: 辛勤挣得的；勤劳的
data.enText: earned or resulting from hard work

data.chText: 他一辈子从未努力认真干过一天活儿。
data.enText: He hasn't done an honest day's work in his life.

data.chText: 要踏实地过日子总是十分辛苦的。
data.enText: It's quite a struggle to make an honest living .

data.text: Use an , not a , before honest .

data.enText: honest!

data.chText: 真的；我发誓
data.enText: used to emphasize that you are not lying

data.chText: 我不是有意的，真的！
data.enText: I didn't mean it, honest!
honest to God/goodness

data.chText: 老天爷作证；说实话
data.enText: used to emphasize that what you are saying is true

data.chText: 老天爷作证，玛丽，我不是开玩笑。
data.enText: Honest to God, Mary, I'm not joking.

data.text: Some people find this use offensive.
有人认为此用法含冒犯意。

data.enText: make an honest woman of sb

data.chText: 和与其发生过性关系的女人结婚
data.enText: to marry a woman after having had a sexual relationship with her

data.text: honest ♦ frank ♦ direct ♦ open ♦ outspoken ♦ straight ♦ blunt

data.chText: 以上各词均形容人坦率、坦诚。
data.enText: These words all describe people saying exactly what they mean without trying to hide feelings, opinions or facts.
honest

data.chText: 指坦率的、坦诚的：
data.enText: not hiding the truth about sth

data.chText: 感谢你对我这么坦诚。
data.enText: Thank you for being so honest with me.
frank

data.chText: 指坦率的、直率的（有时可能不讨人喜欢）：
data.enText: honest in what you say, sometimes in a way that other people might not like

data.chText: 坦白说，我认为你的儿子不大可能通过考试。
data.enText: To be frank with you, I think your son has little chance of passing the exam.
direct

data.chText: 指直接的、直率的、坦率的：
data.enText: saying exactly what you mean in a way that nobody can pretend not to understand

data.chText: 你得慢慢习惯他这种直率的方式。
data.enText: You'll have to get used to his direct manner.

data.chText: direct有时被认为含褒义，但有时是以礼貌的方式表示某人有些粗鲁。
data.enText: Being direct is sometimes considered positive but sometimes it is used as a ‘polite’ way of saying that sb is rude.
open

data.chText: 指为人诚恳的、坦诚的、直率的：
data.enText: ( approving ) (of a person) not keeping thoughts and feelings hidden

data.chText: 他对离开的原因完全未加隐瞒。
data.enText: He was quite open about his reasons for leaving.
outspoken

data.chText: 指直率的、坦诚的、直言不讳的：
data.enText: saying exactly what you think, even if this shocks or offends people

data.chText: 她对该计划的批评直言不讳。
data.enText: She was outspoken in her criticism of the plan.
straight

data.chText: 指坦诚的、直率的：
data.enText: honest and direct

data.chText: 我觉得你没跟我坦诚相见。
data.enText: I don't think you're being straight with me.
blunt

data.chText: 指嘴直的、直言不讳的：
data.enText: saying exactly what you think without trying to be polite

data.chText: 她说话出了名的直截了当。
data.enText: She has a reputation for blunt speaking.

data.chText: 词语辨析
honest和frank既指说话方式，也指说话内容：
data.enText: Honest and frank refer to what you say as much as how you say it.

data.chText: 坦承有错
data.enText: an honest/a frank admission of guilt

data.chText: 两词基本上含褒义，尽管有可能过分直率而不讨人喜欢。
data.enText: They are generally positive words, although it is possible to be too frank in a way that other people might not like.

data.chText: direct、outspoken和blunt均指说话直截了当；outspoken暗含说自己认为正确的话而不惜开罪于人；blunt和direct常含认为诚实比礼貌更重要之义；open含褒义，形容人的性格：
data.enText: Direct , outspoken and blunt all describe sb's manner of saying what they think. Outspoken suggests that you are willing to shock people by saying what you believe to be right. Blunt and direct often suggest that you think honesty is more important than being polite. Open is positive and describes sb's character.

data.chText: 我这个人非常坦诚直率。
data.enText: I'm a very open person.
which word?
to be honest/frank/direct/open/outspoken/straight/blunt
honest/frank/direct/open/outspoken/straight about sth
honest/frank/direct/open/straight/blunt with sb
a(n) honest/frank/direct/straight/blunt answer
a(n) frank/direct/open/outspoken/blunt person/manner
quite/very/really/extremely honest/frank/direct/open/outspoken/straight/blunt
rather frank/outspoken
To be/Let's be honest/frank/blunt… (= what I really think is…)
honest!

data.chText: 真的；我发誓
data.enText: used to emphasize that you are not lying

data.chText: 我不是有意的，真的！
data.enText: I didn't mean it, honest!
honest to God/goodness

data.chText: 老天爷作证；说实话
data.enText: used to emphasize that what you are saying is true

data.chText: 老天爷作证，玛丽，我不是开玩笑。
data.enText: Honest to God, Mary, I'm not joking.

data.text: Some people find this use offensive.
有人认为此用法含冒犯意。

data.enText: make an honest woman of sb

data.chText: 和与其发生过性关系的女人结婚
data.enText: to marry a woman after having had a sexual relationship with her

tr: gained or earned without cheating or stealing
not disposed to cheat or defraud

example: he was true to his word
I would be true for there are those who trust me

value.def: If you describe someone as honest, you mean that they always tell the truth, and do not try to deceive people or break the law.

example.ex: My dad was the most honest man I ever met...
example.tran: 爸爸是我所见过的最正直的人。

example.ex: I know she's honest and reliable.
She fought honestly for a just cause and for freedom.
example.tran: 她为了正义的事业和自由而光明正大地斗争。

value.def: If you are honest in a particular situation, you tell the complete truth or give your sincere opinion, even if this is not very pleasant.

example.ex: I was honest about what I was doing...
example.tran: 我对自己所做的事情并无隐瞒。

example.ex: He had been honest with her and she had tricked him!...
example.tran: 他对她坦诚相见，而她却骗了他！

example.ex: What do you think of the school, in your honest opinion?
example.tran: 坦率地说，你认为这个学校怎么样？

value.tran: 坦诚的;直率的;不隐瞒真相的

example.ex: It came as a shock to hear an old friend speak so honestly about Ted.
example.tran: 听到一位老朋友如此坦率地谈起特德真让人大吃一惊。

value.def: You say 'honest' before or after a statement to emphasize that you are telling the truth and that you want people to believe you.
Some people say 'honest to God' to emphasize their feelings or to emphasize that something is really true.

example.ex: I wish we weren't doing this, Lillian, honest to God, I really do...
example.tran: 我希望我们没有在干这事，莉莲，真的，我真这么想。

example.ex: You wanna know the honest-to-God truth?
example.tran: 你想知道真正的事实吗？

value.tran: （表示强调）真的，实在，千真万确

value.def: You can say 'to be honest' before or after a statement to indicate that you are telling the truth about your own opinions or feelings, especially if you think these will disappoint the person you are talking to.

example.ex: To be honest the house is not quite our style...
example.tran: 说实话，这所房子不太适合我们。

example.ex: I'd rather get it out the way, to be honest.
example.tran: 老实说，我情愿把它处理掉。

trans: (人际或国际纠纷中的)公正调解者，调停者
（表示强调）真的，实在，千真万确
